# About {-}

This bookdown includes some interesting table and figure examples. It can be used as a manual of `ggplot2`, `DT`, `plotly`. 

```{r include=FALSE,}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=9, fig.height=6, fig.align = 'center', warning = F, message = F) 
```
